CustomField.description: This field was added because the product team needs to have test Project records in production, but we need a way to filter those test records out so that they don't show up on external apps or on the LF website.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is a test Project record used by the product team (i.e. not a real project), check this box to keep this project from showing up externally on the LF website, in external apps, etc.
CustomField.label: Test Record
